CustomField.description: Appropriate notes / comments made and actions taken. Problem descriptions are accurate and concise.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Notes should be completed during each case interaction and include findings, pending items, AND all actions taken to resolve (per team SOP). Emails received and sent should also be summarized. POSSIBLE VALUES: 0, 1, 3, 5
CustomField.label: Notes/comments made & actions taken
